document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Best </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#403418">Witchcraft </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">is </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#403418">Geometry </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">To </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">a </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#403418">magician's </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#c0a060">eye </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: Best witchcraft is geometry
